TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpModule

Docs.summary: Provides module initialization and disposal events to the implementing class.

remarks.format: ## Examples For an example of a custom module that implements <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule>, see [Walkthrough: Creating and Registering a Custom HTTP Module](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7787d5be-40a4-4072-9075-c2b767428453).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the module that implements .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Dispose%2A> method performs any final cleanup work prior to removal of the module from the execution pipeline.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Init(class System.Web.HttpApplication context) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides access to the methods, properties, and events common to all application objects within an ASP.NET application
Docs.summary: Initializes a module and prepares it to handle requests.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A> method to register event handling methods with specific events.
## Examples For an example of a custom module that implements <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule>, see [Walkthrough: Creating and Registering a Custom HTTP Module](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7787d5be-40a4-4072-9075-c2b767428453).
